agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents the legal services, contract review, and advice provided to state agencies. This series may include, but not limited to: correspondence, memoranda, legal notes, research material, and other supporting documents.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents citizen and business inquiries and complaints and other related matters, and the responses of the Office of the Attorney General (OAG). This series may include, but not limited to: correspondence, memoranda, and research notes.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents litigation relating to death penalty sentencing, and executions.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents complex advice requests from client agencies and agency personnel. This series may include, but not limited to: policy letters, e-mails, correspondence, notes from phone calls, and faxes.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents routine advice requests from client agencies and agency personnel. This series may include, but not limited to: subpoenas, correspondence, tracking letters, e-mails.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_title: Criminal Litigation Case Files: High Profile
series_description: This series documents high-profile litigation relating to criminal trials and sentencing, including offenders originally sentenced death, but not executed. This series may include, but is not limited to: pleadings, affidavits, briefs, exhibits, and transcripts.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents routine litigation relating to criminal and sentencing. This series may include, but is not limited to: pleadings, affidavits, briefs, exhibits, and transcripts.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents major litigation and claims of historical value representing the Commonwealth, its agencies and personnel, before all state and federal courts. This series may include, but not limited to: pleadings, supporting legal briefs, transcripts, evidentiary exhibits, memoranda, and correspondence.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_title: Informal and Conflict of Interest Opinions
series_description: This series documents informal and conflict of interest prepared by the Attorney General and Deputy or Assistant Attorneys General in answer to state and certain local government officials, involving interpretation of state, federal or conflict of interest laws. This series may include, but not to: related documentation and correspondence.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents litigation and claims representing the Commonwealth, its agencies and personnel, before all state and federal courts. This series may include, but is not limited pleadings, legal briefs, transcripts, evidentiary exhibits, memoranda, and correspondence.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents investigation and prosecution of Medicaid fraud cases. This series may include, but not limited to: photographs, sentencing orders, indictments, interviews, pleadings, and exhibits.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents the investigation of complaints of Medicaid fraud that are determined to be unfounded. This series may include, but not limited to: interviews, surveillance notes, and photographs.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_title: Official Opinions of the Attorney General
series_description: This series documents legal opinions by the Attorney General answer to state and certain local government officials and agencies involving interpretation of state or federal law which establish policy or precedent. This series may include, but not limited to: opinions and the documentation and related thereto.

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents annual Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Form 990-PF tax returns for private foundations or charitable trusts, where either the principal office is located in Virginia, foundation was incorporated in Virginia, or the foundation lists Virginia on Part VII-A, Line 8a of the tax return.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of federal fiscal year

agency_name: Attorney General and Department of Law
series_description: This series documents the enforcement of and the compliance with the 1998 Tobacco Master Settlement Agreement (MSA) and other tobacco-related laws. This series may include correspondence, taxpayer filings, escrow bank statements, retail inspection and stamping reports, certification pleadings, memoranda, investigative files, and exhibits
retention_statement: 15 Years after end of calendar year
